subject: Soccer
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Fabio Capello will begin his new job on Jan. 7, starting a four-year, $12 million contract to coach perhaps the most dissected and ineffectual soccer team in the world.
snippet: Fabio Capello will begin his new job on Jan. 7, starting a four-year, $12 million contract to coach perhaps the most dissected and ineffectual soccer team in the world.
